website_summaries.verdict: Buying these in bulk makes good financial sense. No need to find long or short bolts elsewhere.
pros: Contains both short and long screws for installation
Brushed nickel finish is attractive and easy to clean
cons: Individual pulls in set may not match
Some holes not drilled from center
Screw size doesn't always match product description

customer_reviews.title: Classy!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Look so good! They are heavy and not cheap at all. My dad just got his kitchen redone and they were going to charge him 9.50 for each one of these. This is the best price you will find for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa T.

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality... Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Do not hesitate on purchasing these. My husband has a contracting business and was doing a remodel project for a customer on a budget. Well, there is nothing budget about the quality and finish of these. You can feel the weight of its solid construction. They are not hollow like most you find at big box stores. Well worth the money and more. I would say the price point at a store would be about $5 or $6 each! The finish is a nice brushed nickel and unlike other reviewers none of them were defective. They are also individually wrapped. I would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: I am always worried about buying something like this. My first clue that it was good was that our mail carrier struggled w/ the weight of it. I didn't want something lightweight. I wanted something w/ substance. The guy who put it in was impressed...he does kitchen remodels. He said a lot of times people buy these and the mounting screws have different sizes. Local businesses wanted 3 X what we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Frisco Joy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect finish to cabinet doors
customer_reviews.text: I used on my kitchen cabinet doors (used cup drawer handles on drawers) in my new house. I get so many compliments. These are great quality (come with 2 sizes of installation screws) and give me the exact look I want. Note the length of these before ordering: They are not really long, but they are exactly what I wanted. I definitely recommend the quality of the product. My perfectionist son installed these (without any trouble), and they add so much to the finished look of the kitchen. Now I know from which side to open each cabinet door! I could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: countrygal

customer_reviews.title: Some are crooked/misaligned and measurements are not standardized
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other reviews - these look great but some of them are not perfectly level or aligned. Not noticeable right away until you mount them on the cabinets - then you'll see that the holes don't line up or they are slightly crooked. Beware if you're using one of them as a template for drilling holes on the cabinets. You may be disappointed to find out that they are not standardized.
customer_reviews.author: neworchid

customer_reviews.title: Look great- you may have to buy different length screws though
customer_reviews.text: These did a lot to make our cabinets look more updated. Really great price and they look high end. I didn't have any defective ones in the two packages I ordered. However, I had to buy different length screws as the ones provided were either too long or too short for my cabinet doors (though the longer ones did work for the drawers). Size 8-32 x 1 1/4 in long pan head machine screws did the job for the doors. I'd also suggest buying a template to make it easier, because if you're even a little off you can tell with these bars. I bought Laureys " perfect mount" and that worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Katja

customer_reviews.title: Simple, cheap, get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These are simple and cheap. You get what you pay for - mine were a little scuffed up and loosely screwed together. Went through them all with some thread locker and installed just fine. They came with two sets of screws, which might be nice if you have cabinets with thicker doors.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality at an Unbelievably Low Price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 35 of these handles. High quality at about 25% of the cost at Lowes or Home Depot. My order included both the standard 1 inch and longer 1.75 inch screws which I needed for my cabinet drawers. I wouldn't hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: FCD

customer_reviews.title: You may or may not get the ones.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware as the first set was great. The second set not so much. See pic.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Stump

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and weight
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable is all I can say about these. The quality is top notch and they were easy to install. They feel solid and look as good as those selling for triple the price. Don't hesitate for a minute to buy, you'll be very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Look Great
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th order of these handles. They match all the other handles perfectly. From different companies. The company I used to buy them from was charging 3x more than the last set. I used these handles in the kitchen, in my bathroom, in my garage, in my lanai, my sun room....everywhere. Now I am doing furniture updates for my bedroom and you guessed it, handles that match. Sturdy and they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: JanJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Value buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, clean lines, but the plating is a little inconsistent on some. These are heavy duty and machined well within tolerance - you couldn't even buy the material here in the US, alone from machining them for this price. You'll notice some slight impurities under close inspection, but after the living hell of painting/re-modeling your kitchen cabinets these offer nice value. Measure twice, drill once!!
customer_reviews.author: Speegee

customer_reviews.title: I was concerned the quality would be poor for this amazing price
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned the quality would be poor for this amazing price, but these handles are great and very heavy, I'm very impressed by the quality and they were quite easy to install. However I would recommend purchasing a template to mark your holes.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: These look amazing in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: These look amazing in my kitchen. Easy to install and my package came with both small screws and long screws (for each handle) for varying cabinet thickness. The handles are thick, heavy duty and so worth it for the price. Home Depot and Lowes had the same look for much more money.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel.w212

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe these handles are so nice and such good quality!! We purchased for a home we plan to flip but have now decided to buy for our own home remodel! Great product especially for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzitoff

customer_reviews.title: These are completely amazing! My sisters and I had planned a long ...
customer_reviews.text: These are completely amazing! My sisters and I had planned a long weekend where we were going to redo my kitchen, and I had ordered a much more expensive product from Home Depot that didn't come in time, so I had to order these instead and pay for same day shipping. They have a nice, heavy feel, two different sized screws, looked great, and saved me a ton of money. I am so happy with my purchase! They saved our weekend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are really good quality. I was expecting something less
customer_reviews.text: These are really good quality. I was expecting something less. We bought these to update a rental property and were quite pleased that they were so nice. They are really heavy and we just love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia R

customer_reviews.title: Quality could be better
customer_reviews.text: Overall they are heavy and look good at a distance. However I got one (in my 25 pack) that was totally crooked (see photo). When you get up close the tolerances where the posts connect to the pull bar aren't very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great price and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price and good quality. I was able to install this on my kitchen cabinets with the help of marking tool i bought from home depot for less than $5. Me and my husband was able to fix the handles on all our kitchen cabinets. Quality is really good and the same thing is sold for more in Home Depot. Planning to buy more for my bathroom cabinets. 5 star from me.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Tsetan

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: These handles far exceeded my expectation. They are of the quality you would only expect from a much more expensive product. I would recommend them to anyone, in fact I bought the 25 pack and am now going to order another one for the bathroom and laundry room. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: These handles are great. Just redid my kitchen and went to the ...
customer_reviews.text: These handles are great. Just redid my kitchen and went to the local big box stores to look for handles for cabinets. Had I bought them there, they would have been $6.00 each. These come in at about $1.09 each and are exactly the same thing. Very durable and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Valente

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Impeccably packaged so they arrived in perfect condition. I really appreciate the two different sizes of screws included -- it made installation a breeze! This hardware looks fantastic on cupboards and gives them a modern, minimalist look. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Bea Haven

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality
customer_reviews.text: These handles are heavy, very nice and seem like a good quality. They were much cheaper than the big box stores. They look beautiful on my kitchen cabinets. I recommend these for a nice upgrade to your cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Tails

customer_reviews.title: Good considering the price
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for super high end hardware look elsewhere. QC isn't perfect as other reviewers have mentioned. I had 1 of 25 with the end of beveled. For the price I'm not complaining. I bought them for cabinets in our laundry room. No issues with the screws. As long as you know what you're getting for the price, I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought a single equivalent one of these at HD just to see how it looked on the kitchen cabinet doors, then I ordered these from Amazon for a great savings, even with shipping. The shipping was very fast ( 3-4 days) and I can't wait to get them installed. Heavy, solid construction and a modern look. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Amy R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price, can't tell the difference between these and the pricey ones at homedepot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This cabinet hardware is excellent quality! They look amazing in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet hardware is excellent quality! They look amazing in the kitchen. I already have people asking where we got them so they can order them. Excellent quality and great price. Includes 1" and 2" screws! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great! I had these in my other house that ...
customer_reviews.text: Look great! I had these in my other house that I just sold and bought them at one of the big box stores - these were not nearly as expensive. Thank you! Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Froehlich

customer_reviews.title: Most good, some issues with alignment
customer_reviews.text: Most were very good! Had several in the pack that were bent and not straight. Would love if supplier could supply new ones to replace the bent ones. I do have pictures showing the issue! 5 stars if they provide support and replace the bad handles!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: great-quality
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty and beautifully made hardware. Came with two different sizes of screws for cabinets as well as drawers . Wonderful update to help modernize my kitchen cabinets. I'm very pleased with the purchase and certain they will last us for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every single one was perfect. They are wrapped individually and look brilliant in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!!! This is the exactly what I wanted to refresh my kitchen. These are not lite weight they are nice and heavy. I Will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Nice handles
customer_reviews.text: Nice handles! The only issue I had was that not all of the screws were the correct size. The handles come with 2 different size screws, but again some of those screws were different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana sports parent

customer_reviews.title: Instant update for cupboards!
customer_reviews.text: These are of great quality and look amazing on the cupboards. I replaced old brass (single) knobs and these gave the cupboards an instant updated look!

customer_reviews.title: ... for my kitchen cabinets and my wife and I love the new look they bring to our cabinets
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kitchen cabinets and my wife and I love the new look they bring to our cabinets, very amazing combination:)

customer_reviews.title: Love the handles
customer_reviews.text: Love the handles! They are sturdy and made very well. They arrived very quickly and are a perfect addition to our kitchen renovation.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Good quality. Instant update and new look to my kitchen.

customer_reviews.text: Same quality as you'll find in Home Depot/Lowes, but much better price. Overall consistent from one handle to the next, which is what I was worried about.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected - Nice heavy duty but sleek design
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy - nice design - better than expected; more heavy and sleek than I expected - much better than those in the store I have compared them to. I highly recommend -
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S.

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Made a huge difference in our kitchen. They were so much cheaper than in the store, and are made well. I acticipate no problems. Would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Just painted my cabinets white and these handles go great with my stainless steel appliances
customer_reviews.text: Just painted my cabinets white and these handles go great with my stainless steel appliances!!!! AND, they also send 2" long bolts in case you install them in a drawer with a thicker backing than cabinets. Definitely worth the price and quality is great!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our new kitchen cabinets!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Perfect for our new kitchen cabinets. I love the look. They are nice and solid. Great quality and much better deal than buying from the big box hardware stores.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and sturdy

customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice handles. Heavy and not cheap feeling whatsoever. I had to modify a few of my cabinets to get some to fit, but 90% of the handles/screws worked already. Very Highly Recommended!

customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and stylish handles. Not those cheaply made "metal looking" handles, they are real metal, very solid and you can feel the weight. Bought 50 of these to replace all my kitchen cabinet handles.

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking cabinet door pulls
customer_reviews.text: Great look--great finish--exact fit for modernizing my older cabinets--and they match stainless stell appliances.

customer_reviews.text: These handles worked out perfect for my newly remodeled cabinets. They are a little off square but with the 25 pack I was able to mix and match to find the handles that lined up together.

customer_reviews.title: It also came with long and short screws which is really nice, although all my cabinets used the long screws
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 packs of 25(75 total) and used 47 handles for the kitchen and 24 for my bathroom cabinets/drawers. It also came with long and short screws which is really nice, although all my cabinets used the long screws. Very happy with it considering out of the 75, there were maybe 2 or 3 which gave me problems. The only drawback I see is the high projection. It could hurt you if your legs happen to hit it. Most similar products on Amazon have the same projection. I had to purchase 2 handles(much more expensive) from another company that have a lower projection to be able to make 2 drawers usable to avoid hitting each other.

product_meta.title: South Main Hardware 25-Pack, SH503-SN-25 Modern Straight Bar Handle Pull - Satin Nickel Finish 3" Hole Centers
product_meta.description: Style:25 PackOur straight satin nickel handle pull is an excellent cabinet accessory for any room. Each unit contains 25 total pull handles as well as individually bagged 1" mounting screws. South Main is the ideal hardware for redesigning your home, kitchen and bath. We offer high quality hardware accessories at the lowest possible price. With South Main Hardware, you cannot go wrong.
